Class FieldConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.hevs.isi.field.FieldConnector

    public class FieldConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataPointListener

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static FieldConnector getInstance()
        This method provides an instance of the Field connector (i.e. the fdc variable). This method shall be called within the singleton pattern
        Returns:
        a pointer to the Field Connector

      • initialize

        public void initialize(java.lang.String url,
                       int port)
        This method gives the details of the location of the Minecraft world to which it connects to. It then initializes the connector
        Parameters:
        url - : the url of the server
        port - : the port of the server

      • onNewValue

        public void onNewValue(DataPoint dp)
        This updates the Field It connects to the Minecraft world and feed it with the DataPoint label and value
        Specified by:
        onNewValue in interface DataPointListener
        Parameters:
        dp - a datapoint in the minecraft world

      • startPolling

        public void startPolling(int time)
        called to start polling all the value from the map
        Parameters:
        time - the time between 2 polls
